title: Sources: Steelers trading for star WR Metcalf
description: The Seahawks are trading DK Metcalf to the Steelers, who are signing the WR to a five-year, $150 million contract, sources told ESPN.
author: Brooke Pryor

title: Tracking NFL free agency: Live updates on every signing, trade, cut and rumor
description: We're following NFL signings, trades and cuts for 2025 free agency.
author: ESPN staff

title: England shine in the sun but Cardiff cauldron awaits
description: England delivered the scoreline and style that fans craved, but they will face a stiff test to repeat that feat on the final day of the Six Nations.

title: Missed opportunity as trophy pressure grows on Arteta
description: As Arsenal look like missing out on the Premier League title this season, Phil McNulty looks at Mikel Areta's progress on his 200th top-flight game as Gunners boss.

title: Arteta: 'Smart' Bruno capitalised on Arsenal wall | Neville: It was too far back
description: Mikel Arteta refused to criticise Anthony Taylor for sending Arsenal's defensive wall too far back for Bruno Fernandes' free-kick in their 1-1 draw but said the Manchester United captain had been "smarter" than the referee in taking advantage to net his fine strike.

title: Littler overcomes home hope De Decker to retain Belgian Darts Open
description: Luke Littler defended his Belgian Darts Open title with a scintillating 8-5 victory over home favourite Mike De Decker on Sunday night.

title: NFL offseason updates: DK Metcalf reportedly headed to the Steel City
description: Here's the latest news and everything you need to know about NFL player movement this spring.
author: Yahoo Sports

title: Russell Henley surges ahead late to steal Arnold Palmer Invitational away from Collin Morikawa
description: Russell Henley picked up his first win in more than two years on Sunday afternoon.
author: Yahoo Sports
